General.Name: Lifezone Metals Limited
General.Description: Lifezone Metals Limited, with its subsidiaries engages in the innovation, championing cleaner and sustainable metals production. The company operates through three segments: metals extraction and refining business, intellectual property licensing business, and corporate. Its primary asset is the Kabanga nickel project, which is in north-west Tanzania. The company's second project which is a US based recycling partnership with Glencore, would utilize Hydromet technology to recycle the PGM recovered from spent Autocats. Additionally, its products include nickel, copper, and cobalt. Lifezone Metals Limited is based in Ramsey, Isle of Man.
General.Address: Commerce House, Ramsey, Isle of Man, IM8 2TF
